class FireCube::Shader

A class Representing a single shader.

Method Detail

bool

public operator bool() const;

Create

public bool Create( ShaderType type, const std::string& source );
Creates a shader from source.
Parameters:
shaderType - The type of the shader.
source - The source of the shader.

GetId

public unsigned int GetId() const;
Returns the resource id of the shader.

Load

public bool Load( const std::string& filename );
Loads a shader from a file. the shader type is determined by the extension of the file: .vert for a vertex shader, .frag for a fragment shader.
Parameters:
filename - The file to load.

operator==

public bool operator==( const Shader& shader ) const;
